comment:
* Common authentication options that are exposed across all modalities.
 *
 * @hide

variables.name: DISPLAY_STATE_LOCKSCREEN
variables.comment: The display is on and showing the lockscreen (or an occluding app).

variables.name: DISPLAY_STATE_NO_UI
variables.comment: The display is off or dozing.

variables.name: DISPLAY_STATE_SCREENSAVER
variables.comment: The display is showing a screensaver (dreaming).

variables.name: DISPLAY_STATE_AOD
variables.comment: The display is dreaming with always on display.

methods.name: int getUserId()
methods.comment: The user id for this operation.

methods.name: int getSensorId()
methods.comment: The sensor id for this operation.

methods.name: int getDisplayState()
methods.comment: The current doze state of the device.

methods.name: String getOpPackageName()
methods.comment:
* The package name for that operation that should be used for
     * {@link android.app.AppOpsManager} verification.
